Read first, In Module 7 of Class
PAGES.body:
Welcome to the Module 7

. This module focuses on studnets taking the Cloud Essentials+ Final Assessment. If necessary, take the exam more than once to get comfortable taking the exam. One approach taking exams within the timeframe is not get stuck on PBQ questions. Go through the test, mark questions you want to review to not get held up to early in the test.

PAGES.title: Read first, In Module 8 of Class
PAGES.body:
Welcome to the Module 8

This module focuses on planning the date you'll 'sit' for your exam. The final exam requires students to take the CompTIA exam. Review the Simple Syllabus for grading. If a student does not 'sit', pass or fail the portion of their grade will receive 0%
